title-part.text: DEVICES FOR MOVING WINGS INTO OPEN OR CLOSED POSITION
CHECKS FOR WINGS
WING FITTINGS NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR, CONCERNED WITH THE FUNCTIONING OF THE WING

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following terms are used with the meanings indicated: - "closer" or "opener" includes devices for assisting wing-movement or for wing-counterbalancing.
